action.action-desc: Ms. Eshoo (for herself and Mr. Kelly of Mississippi) introduced the following bill

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend the William M. (Mac) Thornberry National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2021 to improve the semiconductor incentive program of the Department of Commerce.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Investing in Domestic Semiconductor Manufacturing Act.

subsection.text: Section 9901(2) of the William M. (Mac) Thornberry National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2021 (15 U.S.C. 4651(2)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting production, before or research and development; and
by striking of semiconductors. and inserting of semiconductors, materials used to manufacture semiconductors, or semiconductor manufacturing equipment..

subsection.text: Section 9902(a) of the William M. (Mac) Thornberry National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2021 (15 U.S.C. 4652(a)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking for semiconductor fabrication and inserting for the fabrication;
by inserting production, before or research and development; and
by striking the period at the end and inserting of semiconductors, materials used to manufacture semiconductors, or semiconductor manufacturing equipment.; and

paragraph.text: in paragraph (4)(A), by striking used for semiconductors and inserting used for the purposes.
